TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 讓您安裝和設定可讓應用程式在執行時，進行讀取和寫入事件的記錄檔。

span.span: Allows you to install and configure an event log that your application reads from or writes to when running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)安裝事件記錄檔時。The is used by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) when installing an event log. 類別可以在本機電腦上只安裝事件記錄檔。The class can install event logs only on the local computer. 使用類別時，您的應用程式寫入事件記錄檔，則不需要使用您的應用程式事件記錄檔安裝程式來讀取事件記錄檔。Use the class when your application writes to an event log; it is not necessary to use an event log installer for your application to read from an event log. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. > [!NOTE] > 安全性記錄檔為唯讀。The Security log is read-only. 安裝程式會建立您在中指定的事件來源屬性和其事件記錄檔中指定的暫存器屬性。The installer creates the event source that you specify in the property and registers it for the event log specified in property. 此行為是類似於呼叫上元件。This behavior is similar to calling on the component. 使用和方法將事件寫入事件記錄檔。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 您必須指定事件來源寫入事件。您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 您可以設定新的來源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 您可以建立現有的事件記錄檔或新的事件記錄檔事件來源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 當您建立新的事件記錄檔的新來源時，系統會註冊為該記錄檔中，來源，但寫入第一個項目之前，不會建立記錄檔。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 若要安裝事件記錄檔，請建立繼承自專案安裝程式類別，並設定類別`true`。To install an event log, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the for the class to `true`. 在您的專案內建立每個事件記錄檔會寫入您的應用程式，並加入您專案的安裝程式類別的執行個體。Within your project, create an for each event log that your application will write to and add the instance to your project installer class. 當[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)是呼叫，它會查看。When the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) is called, it looks at the . 如果是`true`，工具會安裝中的所有項目與您專案的安裝程式相關聯的集合。If it is `true`, the tool installs all the items in the collection that are associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，工具會忽略專案安裝程式。If is `false`, the tool ignores the project installer. 修改的其他屬性之前或之後加入至執行個體您專案的安裝程式，但安裝程式工具執行前集合。You modify other properties of an either before or after adding the instance to the collection of your project installer, but before the installer tool runs. 您必須設定屬性，如果您的應用程式將會寫入事件記錄檔。You must set the property if your application will be writing to the event log. 使用註冊新的或現有的事件記錄; 新的來源不使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 您可以註冊的當地語系化的資源檔的事件來源事件分類和訊息字串。You can register the event source with localized resource files for your event category and message strings. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄項目使用的資源識別項，而非指定實際的字串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前的語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您可以註冊的事件類別目錄、 訊息和參數插入字串中，個別的檔案，或您可以註冊相同的資源檔，所有的三種類型的字串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和內容來設定要當地語系化的項目寫入事件記錄檔的來源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果您的應用程式會將字串值，直接寫入事件記錄檔，您不需要設定這些屬性。If your application writes strings values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用該來源中的方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，然後使用該來源中的方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。Create a different source without resource files and then use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 一般而言，未呼叫的方法類別從您的程式碼中，它們通常稱為只能由 Installutil.exe。Typically, you do not call the methods of the class from within your code; they are generally called only by Installutil.exe. 此工具會自動呼叫在安裝程序的方法。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process. 它會備份時失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫產生例外狀況物件的方法。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling the method for the object that generated the exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 程式碼範例設定的來源名稱和事件記錄檔名稱，並將至集合。The code example sets the source name and the event log name, and adds the to the collection. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CPP/eventloginstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CS/eventloginstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/VB/eventloginstaller.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CategoryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定分類資源檔中的分類數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

value.span: 分類資源檔中的分類數目。

span.span: The number of categories in the category resource file.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和来寫入事件的屬性當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果您提供類別，當您撰寫事件時，事件檢視器顯示事件項目，類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry, if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來協助篩選事件，或提供事件的相關資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information on an event. 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別是選擇性的。如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和資源檔中的文字當地語系化的事件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CategoryResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的分類字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
The path of the category resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和来寫入事件的屬性當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果您提供類別，當您撰寫事件，事件檢視器顯示事件項目類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來幫助篩選事件，或提供事件的相關資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information about an event. 比方說，您的應用程式可能會有不同的類別，不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application might have separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別是選擇性的。如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和資源檔中的文字當地語系化的事件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

span.span: An to use as a template for the .

summary.span: 為事件記錄檔複製安裝時所需之 元件的屬性值。

span.span: Copies the property values of an component that are required at installation time for an event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的元件`component`參數必須是，否則會擲回例外狀況。The component specified by the `component` parameter must be an ; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 一般而言，未呼叫的方法從程式碼; 內通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 用來設定的屬性值 installutil.exe的現有值。 is used by Installutil.exe to set the property values for the to the values of an existing . 如果的也就是傳入為空字串 ("")，您必須設定屬性設為有效的值執行安裝程式之前。If the of the that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the property to a valid value before the installer executes.

span.span: The specified component is not an .
-or-

exception.span: 指定元件的 或 屬性是 或空的。

span.span: The or property of the specified component is either or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Install(class System.Collections.IDictionary stateSaver) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，用來儲存執行復原或解除安裝作業所需的資訊。

span.span: An used to save information needed to perform a rollback or uninstall operation.

summary.span: 執行安裝，並將事件記錄檔資訊寫入至登錄。

span.span: Performs the installation and writes event log information to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將事件記錄檔資訊寫入至登錄，並將事件記錄檔與所指定的記錄檔相關聯屬性。The method writes event log information to the registry, and associates the event log with a log that is specified by the property. 如果記錄檔不存在，指定來源建立記錄檔，並將新的來源與它相關聯。If the log does not already exist (and a source is specified), creates a log and associates the new source with it. 一般而言，未呼叫的方法從程式碼; 內通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 此工具會自動呼叫寫入安裝的事件記錄檔相關聯的登錄資訊在安裝程序的方法。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the event log being installed. 安裝是交易式的所以如果在安裝期間沒有任何安裝專案元件失敗，所有先前安裝的元件會回復到安裝前狀態。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously-installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 這是藉由呼叫每個元件的方法。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 使用註冊新的或現有的事件記錄; 新的來源不使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法略過註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method skips registering the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 應用程式的安裝常式使用的專案安裝程式自動維護已安裝的元件的相關資訊的屬性。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至為`stateSaver`參數，會持續更新工具安裝的每個。This state information, which is passed to as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool installs each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

exception.span: 安裝程式要嘗試使用的平台不是 Windows NT 4.0 或者更新的版本。

span.span: The platform the installer is trying to use is not Windows NT 4.0 or later.

exception.span: 屬性中指定的名稱是已經為不同事件記錄檔註冊的名稱。

span.span: The name specified in the property is already registered for a different event log.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsEquivalentInstaller(class System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller otherInstaller) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsEquivalentInstaller (otherInstaller As ComponentInstaller) As Boolean

span.span: The installer to compare.

summary.span: 判斷安裝程式和其他指定的安裝程式是否參考相同的來源。

span.span: Determines whether an installer and another specified installer refer to the same source.

returns.span: 如果這個安裝程式和 參數所指定的安裝程式安裝或解除安裝相同的來源，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter would install or uninstall the same source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，未呼叫的方法從程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝程式工具 (Installutil.exe)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the Installer tool (Installutil.exe).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Log { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要將來源設定至的記錄檔名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the log to set the source to.
The name of the log.

value.span: 這可以是應用程式、系統或自訂的記錄檔名稱。

span.span: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用相關聯的來源，您在中指定屬性屬性與現有的記錄檔或在本機電腦上新的記錄檔。You can use the property to associate the source you specify in the property with either an existing log or a new log on the local computer. [Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)來源對應到電腦的登錄中的記錄檔會使用此資訊。The [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) uses this information to map the source to the log in the computer's registry. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. 若要將項目寫入事件記錄檔中，您必須建立來源，並向事件記錄檔。To write entries to an event log, you must create a source and register it with an event log. 事件來源只可以一次寫入到一個記錄檔。An event source can only write to one log at a time. 安裝程式會使用值屬性向您的應用程式事件記錄檔項目的有效來源。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 如果您不指定記錄檔名稱在安裝程式執行之前，安裝程式註冊您的來源應用程式記錄檔。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果您指定新的來源和現有的記錄檔，安裝程式會建立新的事件來源，並將它與您指定的記錄檔產生關聯。If you specify a new source and an existing log, the installer creates a new event source and associates it with the log you specify. 如果您指定新的來源和新的記錄檔，安裝程式會將新的來源關聯在登錄中，新的記錄檔，但寫入第一個項目之前，不會建立記錄檔。If you specify both a new source and a new log, the installer associates the new source with the new log in the registry, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 作業系統會將事件記錄檔儲存為檔案。The operating system stores event logs as files. 當您使用或方法來建立新的事件記錄檔，相關聯的檔案會儲存在指定的電腦上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目錄。When you use or the method to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 檔案名稱由所附加的前 8 個字元設定副檔名".evt"檔案名稱的屬性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 使用註冊新的或現有的事件記錄; 新的來源不使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 如需詳細的事件記錄檔和來源的行為相關資訊，請參閱類別的文件和屬性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的訊息格式化字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
The path of the message resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定來將當地語系化的事件訊息寫入事件記錄檔來源的屬性。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages. 事件訊息是應用程式定義的字串，描述使用者事件。Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄檔項目使用資源識別項。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers. 資源識別元索引位於訊息。A resource identifier indexes a message located in the . 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前的語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 必須設定事件來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定與訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式中寫入事件訊息字串直接管理，而不是使用的資源識別項中當地語系化的資源檔，請勿設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the property. 如果屬性不是本機電腦的識別項 ("。")，.NET Framework 會假設資源檔位於遠端電腦上。If the property is not the local computer identifier ("."), the .NET Framework assumes that the resource file is on a remote computer. 如果屬性值包含磁碟機代號，則資源會假設檔案上\\ \\< machinename\>\\< 磁碟機\>$ 共用 (例如， \\\server\c$)。If the property value contains a drive letter, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\\$ share (for example, \\\server\c$). 如果值包含字串 %systemroot%，則資源會假設檔案上\\ \\< machinename\>\admin$ 共用 (例如， \\\server\admin$)。If the value contains the string %systemroot%, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\admin$ share (for example, \\\server\admin$). 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和資源檔中的文字當地語系化的事件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ParameterResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定資源檔路徑，這個資源檔包含來源的訊息參數字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.

value.span: 訊息參數資源檔的路徑。

span.span: The path of the message parameter resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定事件記錄檔寫入與當地語系化的事件訊息來源的屬性插入參數字串。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings. 指定在每個當地語系化的事件訊息屬性可以包含插入字串的預留位置。Each localized event message specified in the property can contain placeholders for insertion strings. 這些預留位置用來指定的位置和語言無關的字串，事件訊息中的資源識別項。These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message. 事件檢視器中的對應字串，取代預留位置並且針對當地語系化的事件項目將事件記錄檔訊息格式化。The Event Viewer replaces the placeholders with the corresponding strings from the and formats the event log message for the localized event entry. 比方說，訊息的文字檔案的下列區段會定義的參數預留位置的字串：For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` 在參數資源檔中，插入字串必須定義與資源識別項對應至預留位置，如下所示：Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` 必須設定事件來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定與訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式會將事件訊息字串直接寫入事件記錄檔，或您不包含訊息與參數插入預留位置，請勿設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the property. 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和資源檔中的文字當地語系化的事件。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具體而言，資源識別碼 1004年定義的訊息會使用預留位置為資源識別元 5002 定義的參數字串。Specifically, the message defined for resource identifier 1004 uses a placeholder for a parameter string defined for resource identifier 5002. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 將電腦還原到安裝之前的狀態，方法是復原安裝程序寫入至登錄的事件記錄檔資訊。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation by rolling back the event log information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法復原的效果方法。The method undoes the effects of the method. 安裝專案中的任何元件的安裝失敗時呼叫。 is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails. 方法建立或設定事件記錄檔和事件來源的屬性。The method creates or sets the properties for an event log and event source. 請刪除事件記錄檔和來源，或將現有的來源的屬性重設其預先安裝值。 either deletes the event log and source or resets the properties of a pre-existing source to its pre-installation values. 一般而言，未呼叫的方法從程式碼; 內通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 此工具會呼叫方法，這個或其他元件無法安裝，以復原已經安裝程序所做的任何變更。The tool calls the method, when this or another component has failed to install, to undo any changes that the installation process has already made. 應用程式的安裝常式使用的專案安裝程式自動維護已安裝的元件的相關資訊的屬性。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至為`savedState`參數，會持續更新此工具會復原備份。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool rolls back each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用記錄檔登錄的來源名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the source name to register with the log.

value.span: 使用事件記錄檔登錄作為項目來源的名稱。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 通常是應用程式名稱或大型應用程式內的元件名稱。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application. 安裝程式會使用值屬性向您的應用程式事件記錄檔項目的有效來源。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 新的來源名稱不符合現有的來源名稱或現有的事件記錄檔名稱。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每個來源只能寫入一個事件記錄檔一次。不過，您的應用程式可以使用多個來源來寫入多個事件記錄檔。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔案。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果您不指定記錄檔名稱在安裝程式執行之前，安裝程式註冊您的來源應用程式記錄檔。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果您指定不存在的記錄檔的名稱，系統會登錄該記錄檔，但寫入第一個項目之前，不會建立記錄檔。If you specify the name of a log that does not exist, the system registers the to that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 使用註冊新的或現有的事件記錄; 新的來源不使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法擲回例外狀況，如果屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 如需詳細的事件記錄檔和來源的行為相關資訊，請參閱類別的文件和屬性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 從登錄移除事件記錄檔資訊，以移除安裝。

span.span: Removes an installation by removing event log information from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性值是`Remove`、方法會刪除來源和相關聯的記錄檔，如果安裝程式會建立和指定建立新的事件記錄檔和來源的屬性。If the property value is `Remove`, the method deletes the source and the associated log that the installer created if the and properties specified the creation of a new event log and source. 一般而言，未呼叫的方法從程式碼; 內通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)中解除安裝模式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) in uninstall mode. 此工具會自動呼叫還原系統所影響的預先安裝的狀態安裝的組件的方法。The tool automatically calls the method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states. 這包括刪除正在解除安裝的事件記錄檔相關聯的登錄資訊。This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the event log being uninstalled. 應用程式的解除安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已解除安裝元件的相關資訊的屬性。An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至為`savedState`參數，會持續更新此工具解除安裝每個。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool uninstalls each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼明確修改這個狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction UninstallAction { System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在解除安裝時，[Installutil.exe (安裝程式工具)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) 應該移除事件記錄檔，還是將它保留在已安裝的狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) should remove the event log or leave it in its installed state at uninstall time.

value.span: 其中一個 值，表示解除安裝 時，要讓事件記錄檔保持什麼狀態。

span.span: One of the values that indicates what state to leave the event log in when the is uninstalled.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您安裝事件記錄檔時，可以選擇性地將它連接至現有的記錄檔。When you install an event log, you can optionally connect it to an existing log. 如果您這樣做，您必須決定記錄檔應該還原成預先安裝的狀態，或維持在其目前、 安裝後的狀態。If you do so, you must decide whether the log should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state. 如果您選擇事件記錄檔還原成預先安裝的狀態，不會還原變更在安裝時的事件記錄檔項目。If you elect to return the event log to its pre-installation state, changes to the event log entries at installation are not restored. 您可以重設只會與相關聯的事件記錄檔屬性為其預先安裝的值。You can reset only the event log properties that are associated with the to their pre-installation values.

span.span: contains an invalid value.

exception.span: 這個屬性的有效值只有 和 。

span.span: The only valid values for this property are and .
